title: Altona: incorrect logic in shouldDisconnectOnStatus
body:
**Describe the bug**
This issue is found by proto after he seems to finish initial sync
```
2020-07-10 05:49:23  [CHAIN]            info: Processed new chain head newChainHeadRoot=0x6f0f0920aa5d299df1245d925a2f2152c2550226c246ea24f169fcedc72ec700, slot=76069, epoch=2377
2020-07-10 05:49:24  [SYNC]             info: Imported blocks for slots: 76071,76072,76073,76074,76076,76077,76078,76079,76082,76083,76085,76086,76087,76088,76089,76091,76092,76093,76094,76095,76096,76097,76098,76099,76100,76102,76103,76104,76106,76107,76109,76110,76111,76112,76113,76115,76116,76117,76118,76119,76120,76122,76123,76124,76125,76127,76128,76129 
2020-07-10 05:49:24  [SYNC]             warn: Received block parent root doesn't match our head head=0x7cb6a152924d493d6119407b732461d2addee6ec833b38fe169119d576db1dcd, headSlot=76069, blockParent=0x6f0f0920aa5d299df1245d925a2f2152c2550226c246ea24f169fcedc72ec700, blockSlot=76071
(node:201339) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: Cannot read property 'message' of null
    at BeaconReqRespHandler.shouldDisconnectOnStatus (/home/proto/projects/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/sync/reqResp/reqResp.js:214:130)
    at async BeaconReqRespHandler.onStatus (/home/proto/projects/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/sync/reqResp/reqResp.js:184:9)
    at async ReqResp.<anonymous> (/home/proto/projects/lodestar/packages/lodestar/lib/sync/reqResp/reqResp.js:74:18)
```
More at https://gist.github.com/protolambda/c999779f766a0de1df1a6bb313081c47

**Expected behavior**
+ It seems the epoch misses the 1st slot
+ So we should find a way to get correct root of finalized checkpoint given an epoch
